cab.content:
This Document is the Property of His Britannic Majesty's Government.
G.T.5762
SECRET.
BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - 23rd SEPTEMBER, 1918.
1. WESTERN FRONT.
British.
East of YPRES the 2nd Army have established posts 1,000 yards East of the junction of the YPRES - ZONNEBEKE railway and YPRES - GHELUVELT road.
There is nothing to report from the rest of the front.
French.
The French have occupied VENDEUIL, N. of the OISE.
2. ITALIAN FRONT.
There is nothing to report.
3. MACEDONIAN FRONT.
The Serbians have reached the VARDAR and have bridgeheads at KRIVOLAK and PEPELISTE. They have cut the main railway line from USKUB to SALONIKA. They have also crossed the CERNA and have cut the light railway from GRADSKO to PRILEP.
Our forces are still advancing.
4. PALESTINE.
Nothing further to report.
General Staff,
War Office, S.W.1.
Issued at 6.40 p.m.,
23.9.18.
